title: Urban Combat, 'Inherent Vice,' And LA County's Burial Of The Unclaimed
teaser: This episode is the last podcast of Weekends on All Things Considered. Instead of hearing WATC stories here, you can now hear them, and other stories, on the new app, NPR One, and on Twitter @nprWATC.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
